email_content:
Dear Alumni Community,

We are excited to share a quick snapshot of the incoming applicant pool for the upcoming academic year:

• Total applications received: about 5,000 – reflecting continued, record-level interest in the University of Excellence.
• Academic strength: the average standardized-test profiles remain highly competitive, underscoring the caliber of students drawn to our programs.
• Global reach: prospective students hail from more than 100 countries, further enriching the international character of our campus.

Your ongoing engagement – whether through mentoring, recommending qualified students, or simply championing our mission in your communities – plays an important role in attracting such a talented and diverse group.

Thank you for your steadfast support. We look forward to keeping you updated as the admissions season progresses and will share additional milestones in the months ahead.

Warm regards,
John
Alumni Relations Coordinator
University of Excellence
